alert.note: Alert for Fayette (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 1:27PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Marshall, northwestern Benton and southern Fayette Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 126 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Slayden, or 12 miles east of Collierville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mt Pleasant, Lagrange, Michigan City, Slayden, Piperton, Rossville, Moscow, Williston, Grand Junction, La Grange, Early Grove, Hays Crossing, Pattersonville, Forty Five and Ghost River State Natural Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
